security: Disclosing James Earl Ray’s fingerprint formula could assist in avoiding identification or enable forgery, potentially compromising law enforcement and intelligence operations. Directly quoting the document: “LNERGO FINGERPRINT FORMULA FOR JAMES EARL RAY: 16, M OVER M, 9 OVER 4, U OVER W, O OVER I, O OVER O, O OVER I, 12 RPT 16, M OVER M, 9 OVER 4, U OVER W, O OVER I, O OVER O, O OVER I, 12.”
summary: A secret cable from April 22, 1968, relays James Earl Ray's fingerprint formula to multiple international locations via liaison channels, following his identification as the accused assassin.
summary_one_paragraph: This secret cable, dated April 22, 1968, originating from CI/OP/DO, disseminates James Earl Ray's LNERGO fingerprint formula to numerous locations including Asuncion, Bangkok, and Zurich for liaison purposes. The cable indicates positive identification of Ray as the accused assassin and requests that the fingerprint formula be passed to liaison contacts in each specified location. The reference to Director 93162 highlights an earlier desensitization instruction per DOI 70-17.
title: LNERGO FINGERPRINT FORMULA FOR JAMES EARL RAY
